sentences.cn: 类似的, 病症略轻为一点的代谢紊乱疾病是乳糖分解酶素缺乏症.

sentences.en: Clefts are often associated with other more serious congenital defects.
sentences.cn: 裂口常与其他更严重的先天性异常并发.

sentences.en: Conclusion The dysgenesis of lens capsule is intimately correlated with congenital cataract.
sentences.cn: 结论本结果提示晶体囊膜的形成与白内障的发生及眼球的发育密切相关.

sentences.en: Congenital stenosis of the esophagus is not common.
sentences.cn: 先天性食管狭窄并不常见.

sentences.en: He has a congenital heart defect.

sentences.cn: 宫内感染和外伤是其它病因.

sentences.en: Methods Spinal bifida and tethered cord syndrome are congenital malformations.
sentences.cn: 方法　脊柱裂与脊髓栓系综合征是一种先天性疾病.

sentences.en: Methods: Analyzed the status of 49 fetal congenital deformity retrospectively.
sentences.cn: 方法: 回顾分析49例先天性胎儿畸形情况.

sentences.en: Objective To study the methods of external ear reconstruction for congenital microtia.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨先天性小耳畸形的外耳再造方法.

sentences.en: So long as congenital syphilis early diagnosis, is also may permanently cure.
sentences.cn: 先天性梅毒只要早期确诊, 也是可以根治的.

sentences.en: Surgical Treatment of Congenital Atresia of External Auditory Meatus ( Analysis of 13 ears )
sentences.cn: 先天性外耳道闭锁的外科治疗 ( 附13耳分析 )

sentences.en: The individual size difference were both the congenital and the acquired factors.
sentences.cn: 在生长发育中,石斑鱼个体大小差异显著,导致此现象出现是因先天性和后天性二个方面造成.

sentences.en: These thumps are replaced by thrills when valvular insufficiencies or stenoses or congenital defects are present.
sentences.cn: 这些撞击在瓣膜闭锁不全或狭窄,或者有先天性缺损时被震颤所代替.

sentences.en: When John was 17, he died of congenital heart disease.
sentences.cn: 约翰17岁时死于先天性心脏病。

trans.tran_en: a congenital medical condition or disease has affected someone since they were born
